name: Tank War - Armored Storm
description:
The most popular cartoon tank-themed game for App Store is here! ! !
It is different from other tank-themed games! ! !
New power-ups and weapons! ! !
Gorgeous cartoon game graphics and sound effect! ! !
More realistic and thorough experience! ! !
Don’t hesitate! Just download it! !

Tank War Ultimate is an eye-catching classic tank-themed game. cartoon graphics, simple battling ways, numerous levels and stages, creative quest modes, and realistic battling exploding effects! Bring enjoyment of both visual and auditory to you! It has 50 levels in the game. The game play is simple: Just tap screen to attack, drag game pad to move your tank; tap the plane icon to call your plane to drop bomb and the tank one to get help from your ally tanks! Pick up props (weapon) appear in each level to boost. Power up your tank in the store!

Features
- Smooth game control
- Vivid background music is in harmony with the game!
- Add different game scenes and power-ups!
- Numerous levels are provided!
- Awesome game graphics and SFX!
